body:
- kahip decomposition variant. Mapping of ARM64 architecture.

- combine all patches for 1612 into a single file, with additional
  comments to explain the rational.

- filter instead of patching etc/config.*/settings.
  This eliminates patch files for 1706, perhaps for the future as well.

- adjusted handling of urls
title: CONFIG: adjust for new openfoam-com 1712
